Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_Setup: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="819e63c75c4b49a99758cd2b0c8b3553" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="6dc51630880e495bac4fc3d787facf42" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Alright.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guess this is everyone.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6dc51630880e495bac4fc3d787facf42" Scale="1"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="PlayMusic"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]I call this strategy meeting to order!
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="ea39e519253947e7b68d22acdde89d27" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Copy that![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ea39e519253947e7b68d22acdde89d27" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Here's the latest status report.
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2b8326c529c14d4e8925a1e861f45439" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]As of today,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] two Rescue Officers and one
Rescue Pup have been recovered, thanks
to the efforts of [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2b8326c529c14d4e8925a1e861f45439" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]However,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the whereabouts of the other
four Rescue Officers remain unknown,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
the S.S. Shepherd is out of commission.
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ff19056fde814239b7d4d366fc22c703" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]All things considered,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our primary mission,
the rescue of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]has run into
some roadblocks.
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9173cd73d2ee4a379238b3ab8a385cb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Our first priority is now the search and
rescue of our fellow Rescue Officers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9173cd73d2ee4a379238b3ab8a385cb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Grammar:Cap/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9173cd73d2ee4a379238b3ab8a385cb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Fly to the area where our radar picked up
those distress signals, and try to track
down our missing personnel.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9173cd73d2ee4a379238b3ab8a385cb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I will remain with the ship.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll
provide direction and guidance from here.
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="77da19d117294158bdcd407847b9adff" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Don't worry.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll be available via the
S.S. Shepherd's wireless communication at
all times,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so you'll have our full support.
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e6517a0eb0ea4542adc502dc7e8755b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I wouldn't typically assign so much
responsibility to a rookie,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but after seeing
you in action,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I know you can handle it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e6517a0eb0ea4542adc502dc7e8755b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]Plus, you'll be in good paws with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] by
your side.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You two make a great team!
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f3d0a505bc734b368eef29f210e1e549" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what about our search for
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Should we officially
put it on pause?
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="41f39cecf1e841a1ba1cf50d490cb3fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]No.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We may still find him during our hunt
for the other Rescue Officers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41f39cecf1e841a1ba1cf50d490cb3fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]I'll keep it on our mission list,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just in case.
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6fe11d4813bf4fdf92571a8444f379b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]On that note,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hereby call this strategy
meeting to a close!
Story.Story_Area500_2ndDay_MorningTalk_P10: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:BCancel enable="True"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="62da705feab34faf8970677f579b2b2d" Scale="1"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_00_Setup: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="75c6e8adf71842c3b7f478a712f9d19e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="69c127aa4077433db3bc05cdfed2a12b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="WaitSurprise" lipsync="0"/]Wait...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Is it just me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] or did [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] go
through a growth spurt overnight?
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="12f2441ae89343c69bee652982883f2b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]That's actually quite typical for his breed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's a sign that he's now fully grown and
qualified for more rigorous activity.
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3f8cf65336a54c28a25bad2551b42ce3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="WaitGlad" lipsync="0"/]The Pikmin sure are playful today!
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f3bcda73101c4aeaac04aa681e7cc6a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they appear to be letting their guard
down now that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s come into his own...
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="eb81de9e08cd4be6af88b023a5240903" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/]I'm just glad to see they're getting along.
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="dfea55118d3c4cdcaa9de993e4de8012" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Right...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Another benefit of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] being
fully grown is that he can now build up his
[PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Motivation" scale="0.66"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pup Drive[System:Color name="Default"] while completing missions.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dfea55118d3c4cdcaa9de993e4de8012" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]And with regular training sessions,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he can
learn new [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]skills[System:Color name="Default"] that will be useful for
everyday rescue operations.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dfea55118d3c4cdcaa9de993e4de8012" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]From the looks of it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is ready as
ever to fill up that Pup Drive!
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_07: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9f0ae3e5c020401885fd8d2fef22dfb0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="Glad"/]Alright,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] officers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] To your stations, please!
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_08: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="27f9d457d42a44999a6576b0f30ffdbd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_Reaction01: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6fc2329a7e4344c0b643809b4bf54bc8" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="21" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="21" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="21" Type="2" From="7"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Happy_GrowUp_Reaction02: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e43529b839b34fa8a8d881d205e6bf2f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="7"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_TalkNPC_GNpcEdit01_RescueS: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_NarrowView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="36ff74b2cb684deea377f1ee774988ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6ab9d32f65a645408d807f44e19e84d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I now call this strategy meeting
to order.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6ab9d32f65a645408d807f44e19e84d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="11" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]First things first.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] please update us
on the improvements being made to the
S.S. Beagle.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="5ecd593048804a5193fc14376fcdac9b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It would be my absolute pleasure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Captain [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal02"/]Shepherd[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Because they're done!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="b1a8e44fcf2a4066a554c136911dcfdb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The S.S. Beagle now has the ability to
transform any [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Sizai" scale="0.66"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]raw material[System:Color name="Default"] collected
in the field into all-purpose [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Sizai_Clay" scale="0.66"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]clay[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b1a8e44fcf2a4066a554c136911dcfdb" Scale="1"/]With this functionality,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we should be able
to easily [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]build[System:Color name="Default"] on location!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="8a23b64344c24126bb5f9a0ddf34891c" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="11" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Excellent.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Of course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm not quite sure
what we'll be building,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but good work
nonetheless.
[Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8f310d79b950495ab16888c4b91b292e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="8"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="ea7a6751f42b49bb9c465c72b4a8a175" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]One last thing![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Bring me raw material,
and I'll be able to whip up exciting new
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gear [System:Color name="Default"]and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]items[System:Color name="Default"] for you in the Lab.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ea7a6751f42b49bb9c465c72b4a8a175" Scale="1"/]I have no doubt they'll be useful to you
while out in the field.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0bd89f5a07344f5681579a5ad2a057fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Sounds like we're not only collecting
treasure now but raw material too.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e5d59bbad468478b82101f369d229399" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]And don't forget about our missing Rescue
Officers![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We're counting on you to find
them, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e5d59bbad468478b82101f369d229399" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]By the way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]come talk to me later[System:Color name="Default"] when
you have a minute.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I would like to discuss
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s training.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e5d59bbad468478b82101f369d229399" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]I hereby call this strategy meeting
to a close!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b06a8b6f5c4e4dab80f485e618587b00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_Rescue_FirstLeaf_: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_NarrowView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="91c4582a0934459cac9017d2e3ce4e0b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="17" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ded87db0f1834b8ab6ac90e462fbfad6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Talk"/]Any updates on this castaway?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What's
their current condition?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4b5ca262250b453c85589c837b35cbd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Nothing new to report.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're still asleep,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and they haven't responded to any of our
attempts to wake them up.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4b5ca262250b453c85589c837b35cbd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The oddest thing is they don't seem to
need a helmet to breathe.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And we have
no idea how that's possible.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0d3abe4d0b5b42d797464372414c255a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Then we need to get our doctor
involved ASAP.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d3abe4d0b5b42d797464372414c255a" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]In the meantime,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we're counting on you two
to locate the remaining Rescue Officers
and collect more treasure.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Understood?

[Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="dcca8d42bd7b441aa1556a776d923c22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
[Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f56df00a91554953aac10a1a11f8b9fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Yes"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:BCancel enable="True"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f67a510881094ca291979524a2f9c468" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Hm![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Excellent.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:BCancel enable="True"/][UE:Meta key="3a8293c9aa7b4bcabf9a9d867348f973" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]You're going to fit right in around here.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I can already tell.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d8c9ac784d4a48418f1879df01c09630" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What was that nonsense?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="3682ac90a9124d83b0fff54775c243a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]I dunno...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It kinda had a fun ring to it,
I think.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c824c5d2b8204350b2e4855e6231318e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]I hereby call this morning's strategy
session to a close.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="31ff2a8e4dfe4900a121e3ad94ff68f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that, Captain!

[Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e5fdd86a031548e0994ce4dd4534e4eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="17" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Talk" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fd1fb5fa6c1e414b8a1ba602a74ef9b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Talk"/]Any updates on this castaway?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What's
their current condition?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ecfe5244e7344e1395301cdf262435d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Nothing new to report.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're still asleep,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and they haven't responded to any of our
attempts to wake them up.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ecfe5244e7344e1395301cdf262435d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The oddest thing is they don't seem to
need a helmet to breathe.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And we have
no idea how that's possible.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8d8bf6ad424c462b890238b3bcb88118" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]They need to be examined by a
doctor ASAP.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8d8bf6ad424c462b890238b3bcb88118" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]To make that happen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we'll need you two
to locate the remaining Rescue Officers
and collect more treasure.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Understood?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8d8bf6ad424c462b890238b3bcb88118" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Good.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hereby call this morning's strategy
session to a close.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to your
stations, please!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a1f1c6d0ec1e43838df0e7ea1e815ca3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!

our pilot while stranded?
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="6a85b2960ede4b6ab9f93db7755a0734" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Tajirogu"/]Well, uh...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yeah.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I ran into [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] at some
point,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but then he got, like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] snatched up by
a leaf creature.
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_P02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="54a71cc1b24546a1ab0fe755df717ebb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Leaf...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]what?!
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_Root:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="8e00a6376fef4c459926b8eba464a171" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]We saw the leaf creature pick up someone
else and toss them onto a big pup.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8e00a6376fef4c459926b8eba464a171" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I tried to follow, but...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8e00a6376fef4c459926b8eba464a171" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Tajirogu"/]We were too late.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They dragged the
castaway into a cave, and suddenly
they were growing leaves too!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d935917ca3654cd9a32f213402d863c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Hold on,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was just getting to the

Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_After02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="433561d646124d39a57427203b27d425" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]You think I'd lie about this?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Who is this
character anyway...
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_Action01: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8c15146feb554c5288649ddeac2196bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_Last_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="1922c04414a242d583da2495bb3b72b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So then the leaf creature in charge
spotted us![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We got outta there as fast as
we could...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or at least that's what I thought.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1922c04414a242d583da2495bb3b72b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]When I turned around,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was gone.
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]Maybe he didn't make it out.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Or maybe he
got turned into a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]leafling[System:Color name="Default"] too.
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_Last_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d7ecc3ecb390424e851611506b827a8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]A [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]leafling[System:Color name="Default"]?
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_Last_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="87559c8ac8264755a8efbafaba3973b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's what me and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] started
calling 'em.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's much faster to say leafling
than "leaf creature."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="87559c8ac8264755a8efbafaba3973b6" Scale="1"/]Catchy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] isn't it?
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_Last_Action02: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7fd683074a294f5291fc839baaaa47ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Think" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_NoLeaf_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="6b032281a455453793793cd1f91e7745" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or who are these leaflings?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6b032281a455453793793cd1f91e7745" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]But first things first—we need to find and
rescue our pilot.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to your
stations, please!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fbe0ca61c21b432fb6804e5fd8955218" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So then the leaf creature in charge
spotted us![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We got outta there as fast as
we could...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or at least that's what I thought.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fbe0ca61c21b432fb6804e5fd8955218" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]When I turned around,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Bernard was gone.
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]Maybe he didn't make it out.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Or maybe he
got turned into a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]leafling[System:Color name="Default"] too.
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_Leaf_Last_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c03b4119512e42fab50def10e646f91c" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="17" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what's this leafling doing here
anyway?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And why are they unconscious?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
This your work, comms guy?
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_Leaf_Last_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="62652dcfd94544ba94d18dd52225c7bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Obviously not.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="62652dcfd94544ba94d18dd52225c7bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]And I have no idea why they're currently
unconscious.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]
who recovered them.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="62652dcfd94544ba94d18dd52225c7bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]But based on what you're saying,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this
leafling could potentially be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?!
Story.Story_Area500_RescueSenior_Leaf_Last_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="ae1f7e05ff6f40cb9fc7ad7fdb0d1a47" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/]Potentially.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ae1f7e05ff6f40cb9fc7ad7fdb0d1a47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]By the way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I sort of coined
the term "[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]leafling[System:Color name="Default"]."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ae1f7e05ff6f40cb9fc7ad7fdb0d1a47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We came up with it because they have all
those leaves growing out of their heads.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Pretty clever, I know.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RescueSenior_Leaf:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="c1205ef816c54cd5b13d7c8301a90db3" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]This castaway may be our pilot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but undoing his leafy state is
beyond our expertise.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c1205ef816c54cd5b13d7c8301a90db3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]We need to rescue these leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
without a doctor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's not much else
we can do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We need to find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], stat![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c1205ef816c54cd5b13d7c8301a90db3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to your stations, please!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="50f5b33c6801422bb5035b8e16885371" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that, Captain!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RescueDoctor_NoLe: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="86e1d942fa7147a08d84cf02484d45bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a9ca0a8f2cba4cf3938cf290f01b8ecb" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Talk"/]That about sums it up, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Have any
thoughts on this leaf-growing condition?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e4d50ead21574ff9a65b2595d507907b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Yes...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Leaflings, eh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a
fascinating conundrum indeed.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e4d50ead21574ff9a65b2595d507907b" Scale="1"/]Very fascinating...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e4d50ead21574ff9a65b2595d507907b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You, new blood![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e4d50ead21574ff9a65b2595d507907b" Scale="1"/]I have a theory I'd like to test.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But I'll need
to get my hands on that leafling.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could
you find them for me?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="614f5c0453114c3d8cb98d8ecacb8bfc" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Aha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I knew [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] would have something
up his sleeve.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="614f5c0453114c3d8cb98d8ecacb8bfc" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Now that we have a plan,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's hurry up
and recover that leafling![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to your
stations, please!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0b878edd42cd4445846b0792a44549d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that, Captain!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RescueDoctor_Leaf: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c8e6d3628f1247f2925b86b91b2b8365" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="17" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="539de9e2178d422aad28f67b36b3784d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Talk"/]You should be caught up on everything
now, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="539de9e2178d422aad28f67b36b3784d" Scale="1"/]According to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this castaway may
just be our pilot.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RescueSenior_Doct:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f18e3600981f482687dac5a3b60676a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I see.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f18e3600981f482687dac5a3b60676a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="17" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we're going to need you to examine
this leafling for us.
Story.Story_Area500_RescueNightGuide_Leaf_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6560bb8b21134ebeabb70c1a7990e13f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="17" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Let me thiiink...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The primary symptom is
the growing of leaves,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] yes?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6560bb8b21134ebeabb70c1a7990e13f" Scale="1"/]If that is the case,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then I believe we may
be able to cure them.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6560bb8b21134ebeabb70c1a7990e13f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]While stranded,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I discovered a bewitching
specimen called a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lumiknoll[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It only
appears in the dark of night.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6560bb8b21134ebeabb70c1a7990e13f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]When dawn breaks,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it releases a sap quite
high in degradative enzymes.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6560bb8b21134ebeabb70c1a7990e13f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitQuestion"/]I believe I can make a medicine out of
those secretions that can break down
the newly grown leaves.
Story.Story_Area500_RescueNightGuide_Leaf_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_FocusPoint345_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3b3675b7a1e64891880d9b59bb0681f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for real?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I mean...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]cool.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]But then they'll
find out I just left Bernard behind...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Uh-oh.[System:Color name="Default"]
Story.Story_Area500_RescueNightGuide_Leaf_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="ccee25028754443397213b8571878a1c" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="WaitSad"/]Alaaas,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our friend [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] here consumed all
the sap that I previously collected,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheh.
Story.Story_Area500_RescueNightGuide_Leaf_Acti: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2ff50dc3e1be45048501ddc55130f24c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="10"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_RescueNightGuide_Leaf_Last:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0202982a413549bf92505cbe616a8457" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]So new blood will have to perform some
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]night expeditions[System:Color name="Default"] to harvest the medicinal
ingredients for us.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="cd3360eeb6e944529edccfd31e88d59e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's nothing to lose sleep over.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Except
in the literal sense,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cd3360eeb6e944529edccfd31e88d59e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Find me later, and I'll teach you all you
need to know about night expeditions.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f3dd9694fed24e5b9cb492abe1be544d" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Excellent.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thanks to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it sounds like
we have a solution to our leafling dilemma.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f3dd9694fed24e5b9cb492abe1be544d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Now, everyone,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to your stations, please!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="99f2b9c5148b4cd7bbce7567b4ac8fbd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that, Captain!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RecoveryNpc_Befor: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d0bab8b97bdc49788a65f8c9378a47c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="1" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Command"/]Right![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Administer the cure at once!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="16a0ae1bc8f94ed286fd0cb5f7499264" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="17" Type="1" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger03"/]Yes, Captain!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RecoveryNpc_After:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="35dbc52934184af0ad14d01992f043e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Our work doesn't end here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's our duty to
care for and protect anyone we've rescued
and hear what they have to say.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="19323b2a74e44637a7716a6c2321dbfd" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Amaaazing![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The radar isn't picking up the
presence of any more leaflings![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="19323b2a74e44637a7716a6c2321dbfd" Scale="1"/]Could that mean...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]we've cured every last
leafling on this planet?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Eheheh!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RecoveryNpc_End_C:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e86dab15393c4696a9164a353b97886f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Great work,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] everyone.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Tales of our
success will be passed down for
generations!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnLeafPilot_00_Se: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a4a731e5f6af4408969b709f3df289c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="14" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnLeafPilot_00_P0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="4ec092b8ee9d4fd7b4bc545e2becd6a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm pleased to see that you are
back on your feet.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="460f77e079c241a6abffe505cee06a8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="14" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Um,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are you sure it's OK for you to be
up and about already?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Play it cool,
Dingo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] play it cool...[System:Color name="Default"]

[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="71892c4e8bab4acba06a3e8ce2953db7" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Area500_UnLeafPilot"/]I appreciate your concern, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I am
good to GO![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="71892c4e8bab4acba06a3e8ce2953db7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It's strange.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Since losing my leaves,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I feel
as LIGHT as a feather![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="71892c4e8bab4acba06a3e8ce2953db7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Now the NEXT time I get abandoned in
a cave,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I should be able to ESCAPE all
on my own!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="467bba0066b345c1bcf92d5acabe0732" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Ha...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]ha.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What are you trying to say?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]So he's mad at me for running, after all![System:Color name="Default"]

[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="0a1c900e30244ba09d78ec27465260ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] nothing.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Just a little JOKE!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnLeafPilot_00_Ro:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="673e22fd90ff4811a7994c4c0d76e996" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Good, good![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Finally, all the members of the
Rescue Corps are together again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="673e22fd90ff4811a7994c4c0d76e996" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]I hereby reinstate our primary mission—
the rescue of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!

Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnLeafPilot_00_Re: [Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="70ff2931219947bb87283cbc4bd994e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnLeafPilot_00_Af:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fbf3adf1656d427889b208535c9213ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Wowee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] PERFECT response![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You must be
the secret weapon our captain's been
talking to me about.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fbf3adf1656d427889b208535c9213ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]Thank you VERY much for saving me.

[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="28b1ae45b75f4e768229c0ad488bed16" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]WOW![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Where'd they find a rookie like YOU?[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
So UNIQUE![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You must be the secret
weapon the captain's been talking about.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="28b1ae45b75f4e768229c0ad488bed16" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]Thank you VERY much for saving me!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnLeafPilot_00_La:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="e3936459505c4afe8f702db2f010ec0e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Excuse me, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] This may pertain to
the SUBJECT of a certain [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s
whereabouts...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e3936459505c4afe8f702db2f010ec0e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TabletLookStart"/]I found a logbook entry that CAUGHT
my interest.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnLeafPilot_01_P0: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="5a7d42519f1a4e92ad2a9199001fe667" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="14" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Could this be...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="61da6ea0cab64dcca32fa2d9f1af44da" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Talk"/]If this entry is accurate,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] must be
hiding in a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]very large structure[System:Color name="Default"]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="61da6ea0cab64dcca32fa2d9f1af44da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]However,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I haven't detected any place that
fits that description using our radar.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="353c88c9194c45ef8dfdd000e7045098" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Blasteroids![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wonder if that has anything
to do with the S.S. Shepherd's energy
shortage.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="353c88c9194c45ef8dfdd000e7045098" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]First things first—we need to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]get this
ship fully charged[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to your
stations immediately!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="77441ba1948b4034ae3584c31545ac96" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea010_Bef: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ada93bfd9f7149ab8e2894c394dfb36b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7472b7dc5af34e9cb1fab261e3b65705" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Finally, we were able to restore the
S.S. Shepherd to maximum energy
capacity.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank you all for your hard work!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="a1de482add774a8892e198277b4d3bdd" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]While searching the area with the newly
restored S.S. Shepherd,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we discovered a
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]very large structure[System:Color name="Default"] and an SOS signal.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a1de482add774a8892e198277b4d3bdd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]I'm positive we'll find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] there!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="46f60f68402e4d6fb040f8552b96f315" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="14" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSurprise"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Wait.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Could that mean...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="fdb697199fdd4794a29dd26e07984e20" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Talk"/]While searching using our newly restored
radar,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we received a very strong SOS
signal from inside a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]large structure[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fdb697199fdd4794a29dd26e07984e20" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]It must be coming from [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea010_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7650194c9c784842bb6fcadfb7d08ec4" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Commendable work![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7650194c9c784842bb6fcadfb7d08ec4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="11"/]As always,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the rest is up to you,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea010_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9885e55b213648f1a13e84066b496f4d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to your stations, please!

Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea010_2_P: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="aec8b75483c946428bfcd445ba53d030" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="0" From="7"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Whaaa?![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aec8b75483c946428bfcd445ba53d030" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Has Oatchi's tail always been so...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]green?[System:Color name="Default"]
Story.Story_Area010_ExplainBankCard_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a6b3ed91325146d7b978d1067cf86439" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] here.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It looks like you're safely
inside the structure.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a6b3ed91325146d7b978d1067cf86439" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Based on your current location,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we were
right to conclude that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is
in this area.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a6b3ed91325146d7b978d1067cf86439" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I found a log associated with your exact
coordinates.
Story.Story_Area010_ExplainBankCard_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3a2e2e0192944ba3a611f6ddcfc9146e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]And we've got one MORE piece of
surprising news![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3a2e2e0192944ba3a611f6ddcfc9146e" Scale="1"/]The SPACESHIP we found at the Rescue
Command Post is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3a2e2e0192944ba3a611f6ddcfc9146e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]After analyzing its flight logs,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we can
CONFIRM it came from Hocotate!
Story.Story_Area010_ExplainBankCard_01_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f08a96f000734087b5344f7afe23b4ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Which means we can now track down
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] by scent![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f08a96f000734087b5344f7afe23b4ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Before you set out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] memorize
any smells associated with the ship so we
might be able to find its castaways.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f08a96f000734087b5344f7afe23b4ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]So find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We're
counting on you, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
Story.Story_Area010_CollectOlimar_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="76a54223442841858c4fb8a20e40d5d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Huzzah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Rescue complete!
Story.Story_Area010_CollectOlimar_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="88f3356eba6e473dbaa321e7be4c663e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Of course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we still can't read his ID badge
due to the leafification.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="88f3356eba6e473dbaa321e7be4c663e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]But if this is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then it's
mission accomplished!
Story.Story_Area010_CollectOlimar_01_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e62a14e506234f3581362ec0ab5250d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's right.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now, let's get him cured,
and fast.
Story.Story_Takafuda_CollectOlimar_NotAchieved: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fbdd93b5798f45bcb898b5e0adcc6c0e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="17" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c3c192628be04b8f838f5bf95720c7d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Now all we have to do is administer the
cure to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c3c192628be04b8f838f5bf95720c7d2" Scale="1"/]Time for another night expedition to
collect more glow sap.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="851a444ae8ee4f6e9bc95b34821e4816" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Our mission is finally drawing to a close.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="851a444ae8ee4f6e9bc95b34821e4816" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Don't let your guard down now,

Story.Story_Area500_OlimarRecovery_01_01_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="318bbe1b4a31468ab4b6a51474e5819a" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="15" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="15" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Doctor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] administer the cure.

Story.Story_Area500_OlimarRecovery_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9cec7d0c25c94bcda238b341475e73bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="15" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitQuestion"/]So many space suits...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Who are you guys?
Story.Story_Area500_OlimarRecovery_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b4b125012a004659a6678498e81b367e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="PlayMusic2"/]Excuse me while I get my bearings.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I must've been shipwrecked...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b4b125012a004659a6678498e81b367e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Looks like I've caused you all quite a bit
of trouble.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My apologies.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b4b125012a004659a6678498e81b367e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I owe the entire Rescue Corps a massive
thank-you.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Truly.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b4b125012a004659a6678498e81b367e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] How silly of me![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I forgot to mention...
Story.Story_Area500_OlimarRecovery_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fc030b561c924f15985cce1e435ec43f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Area500_OlimarRecovery"/]I am [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] of the great
S.S. Dolphin.
Story.Story_Area500_OlimarRecovery_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="75051e45a4514e8790e5171f3a064bf2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Or once-great S.S. Dolphin.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's currently
in disrepair.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My employer is going to be...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
less than pleased when I return home.
Story.Story_Area500_OlimarRecovery_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1c46f218673b44fabe7b7c73588912c1" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_Olimar_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you hadn't been shipwrecked,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we'd
never have found all the treasure here...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1c46f218673b44fabe7b7c73588912c1" Scale="1"/]We could use some of the profits to buy
you a new ship![etc:Wait frame="15"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/] And while we're at it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's
get the S.S. Shepherd plated in gold!
Story.Story_Area500_OlimarRecovery_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2233440a582b48869d24bb1a5634b68d" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Gold-plated?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] No, no.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The S.S. Shepherd
would look better with a chrome finish.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2233440a582b48869d24bb1a5634b68d" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="15" Type="1" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitNoVoice"/]Ahem,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's enough joking around for now.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="87cf053add244749a57c9641e027365c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="SadTalk"/]No.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It would take much more than that to

S.S. Shepherd and paused our flight.

Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_26: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a6629884b9cf44ccb2ea753c4f274d67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="WaitSurprise" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="WaitSurprise" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s feeling better!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="59b0c605ae0c4e2ea70fa728bca64711" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Surprise" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I think that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]leaf [System:Color name="Default"]may be the cause
of his troubles.
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c2702012ab364027ace66321cb68c68e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Before the Rescue Corps received my
call for help,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I did attempt an escape from
this planet on my own.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c2702012ab364027ace66321cb68c68e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]But unbeknownst to me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] had snuck
into my ship's cargo hold.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She started
exhibiting symptoms much like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c2702012ab364027ace66321cb68c68e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]I rushed back to this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and that's
when I shipwrecked yet again.
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_Setup_03: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="606f14cb0b794940bd4806a445e9ec14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_Olimar_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_27:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f59391a716604c6dbaaf6a83261f431f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I don't know why,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but organisms growing
these leaves are seemingly unable to
leave this planet.
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b9cf03b63d2842ca93576bf7ea7f4102" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]No...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That can't be.
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="210f12babcf54e229dfbc6aaf1f4f942" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can we use the medicine you
created to cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2ebfd82607344406b1e52092a68856e7" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_Olimar_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Actually,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] while making the cure for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I had a hunch and tested it on [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2ebfd82607344406b1e52092a68856e7" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Sadly, it had no effect.
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_07: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="74d7ddaf1ff446049a4dd5dd7a527ed7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSad"/]So what do we do now?
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_08: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="195a44cbf45c4546a9f59efe78332852" Scale="1"/]Rescue Oatchi!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_08_Reaction01: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3f51a1ffc5514beca5882a617bcde4ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Yes" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="81ce865ced8844a99eb67dcdb7276060" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/]Of course![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s loyal partner,
through and through!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_09: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="73e242ff361f451282b96dd07cf13d32" Scale="1"/]Work together!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_09_Reaction02: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="96864f8d258c4a6db73a81a92a1f3422" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Yes" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5ee6e8480dd54313b6d241a5856a76d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]That's right![etc:Wait frame="8"/] If we all put our heads
together,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we're sure to find a way to
cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_Setup_04: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ad8ef6b689f4497c976b183fe21498c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="9"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="bed3ac02cdc245c7b663036b4f4cf8de" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Listen up, everyone.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bed3ac02cdc245c7b663036b4f4cf8de" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]During our attempted escape from this
planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we received a message from
Headquarters dated a while back.
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ce416918a2654e669621a1b0bb3dec5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]We must have been out of range while
within the planet's atmosphere.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ce416918a2654e669621a1b0bb3dec5e" Scale="1"/][etc:Wait frame="15"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]So...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What did it say?
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_14:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2efa3b5c18fd4bb58d01681590e6bce4" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="11" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="TabletLookStart"/]It's a request to rescue all castaways
currently stranded on this planet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They
provided a list.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] take a look.
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_15: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c086a283b15d4c1c9d9ff699fe90cbfb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSurprise"/]This is a long list...
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_16:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="de9b8a1924a84ec79eaee3e9893139cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSurprise"/]Huh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I know this Koppaite [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Weeell,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I know of her.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="de9b8a1924a84ec79eaee3e9893139cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]She's famous in academic circles and is
a preeminent veterinarian.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perhaps she
could help us cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_17:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f757916120dc485bbe56e23321f26fbe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitQuestion"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] isn't the only Koppaite on the list.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Did she come with companions?
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_18:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="30ae02794c804a09b5dffd4f4f3b51ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Makes sense.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] She probably wouldn't have
come here alone.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="30ae02794c804a09b5dffd4f4f3b51ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]But I don't remember encountering any
Koppaites when I was a leafling...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="30ae02794c804a09b5dffd4f4f3b51ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="4" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If I had to guess,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd say they must have
crashed in an area that neither the
Rescue Corps nor I have explored.
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_19:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d452f00fe8ef4c6dacf03dbfefecfc65" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Then we'll have to find a way to extend
our radar's reach and expand our
search radius.
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_20:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d302c829e95345b1825d246deb2c565d" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Sounds like we're going to[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] need more
sparklium[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d302c829e95345b1825d246deb2c565d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's get to work!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_21: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ff7dfb82edc543f2b871840d09243a1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_28:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="12200f0c9f214a7d926e31a97e39885c" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="11" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do you think it's possible to boost
our radar even more?
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_22:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="43d117105cbd43a0ab1175533ea912fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="WaitQuestion" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Oh, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Never underestimate
the power of science...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and forethought![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="43d117105cbd43a0ab1175533ea912fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I've already implemented a direct
connection between the radar and our
power source to give it some extra oomph!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_23:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1c33470b675847b2a100d33fc144cdea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="WaitGlad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/]Excellent work, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] And impressively
fast, to say the least.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1c33470b675847b2a100d33fc144cdea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I can't say I understand most of what you
said, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]but it sounds like we should go ahead
and switch on the radar!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_24: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0aba736a48a14f74bd081343b5a87d17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Area500_SearchLucky"/]Now then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's begin our search!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_25_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5614e92fce274755b8249e98528e5f45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]Hmm...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5614e92fce274755b8249e98528e5f45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]We got something! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Multiple SOS signals
have been detected in an unexplored area!
Story.Story_Area500_SearchLucky_25_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1044dba846a3425f9ae542608ae29f0c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Some of these signals have to belong to
