[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the other Koppaites![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1044dba846a3425f9ae542608ae29f0c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Let's get this rescue off the ground![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s counting on us.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea004_Set: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c17ebfd1fc034be5a326893adb01716e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea004_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4fa7cc3c02c04210a6050dd6c52933a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Good morning,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] officers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm calling this
strategy meeting to order![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's recap
our current situation.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea004_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ed8199ceff48484ca6d44289098d0d97" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s condition.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Or, rather,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] his tail's
condition.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If we can't cure his leafy
appendage,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we can't leave this planet.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea004_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="ec0a3d2081d14f6f8d3504397c8b8177" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Luckily, there is a veterinarian on this
planet, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] who miiight just be able to
help us and cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea004_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5653fcb2bfce48d397440e2a58bcdc6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]And we believe she's located in the same
area where those newly received
SOS signals are originating.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea004_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="faea65a26a30464cb68cb313185225c0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]OK.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Then for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s sake,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
as quickly and efficiently as we can.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea004_P05: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8943b5497d6b4a6aa7fa619ea3c97363" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9b0bc3636be948d0ac574f60f430d57c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Huh?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Is that really...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And what's he
doing with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_00_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="851df13e180b46c2bed10341c62e9934" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you know that guy?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't recognize
him from the list of castaways.
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_00_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3934e690327743a39b48899b782bc874" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] He's a coworker of mine
at Hocotate Freight.
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_00_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9f4dd3bb2a3b411f8ce4ab16dfa1028f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Is he trying to rescue that castaway?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9f4dd3bb2a3b411f8ce4ab16dfa1028f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Could that castaway be—
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_00_P04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3f7fa1a786324faf87c8f4f861ed3815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Look at those round ears![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's a Koppaite!
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_01_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f470b3183083471cb0a806da64a04209" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Hold on...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] He's disappeared.
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_01_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="bf1c482266a04334acab50248c81fbdb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Argh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What's he doing running around
with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] anyway?
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_01_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="016814becccd4c0c9ea6115dff097ad5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Perhaps your employer sent him here to
help you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_01_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8eb03cc0eb644d0c8d77b1442a7457ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Perhaps...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Though [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] wouldn't have been
my top choice.
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9451490d6c594aa28987933445b0f360" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Let's follow [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We don't want
anything to happen to that possibly
Koppaite castaway.
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b48edc49850445e3ab3d2f0d3484d152" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Luckily, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is already familiar with
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s scent.
Story.Story_Area004_PodTalk_Louie_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d5d0bd8425534678927661da93ac4bb9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]What are you waiting for?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[Grammar:Cap/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Track [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s scent!
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit24_A_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="63460a270e34499eaea2742b43f1323a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let's check their ID badge.
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit24_A_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9095a97f292b44499bdcf99718ba69bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Huzzah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It is a Koppaite castaway.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's
hope he has information regarding [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s
whereabouts.
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit24_B_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="854c049c658a40a99e6165de32d183ef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let's check their ID badge.
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit24_B_01_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0ea263767ea8491094a7167773674be1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s companion.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] A Koppaite!
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit24_B_01_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c501a28c773c45eb9c430af60996fee7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Oof![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank goodness he's alive.
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit24_B_01_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1d4f70d8ce954520ba67dc72f1e5fa2f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Indeed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He appears to be unharmed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I bet
he'll be quite relieved when he wakes up.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_Setu: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_NarrowView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="518b0d714fbc46eb9c23b9446a16b3ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="14"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e9f16a48c265483b8dca37a00404cc6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Thanks for getting me out of there.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The name's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Charlie"/]Don Bergman[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But a lot of
folks just call me [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e9f16a48c265483b8dca37a00404cc6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'm a treasure hunter by trade.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Mostly I
just travel the galaxy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] fighting the good
fight on behalf of the little guys.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="50662d6e95fb4afd89708e788e7efcce" Scale="1"/]Good to meet you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/] So, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Do you, by
any chance, know a veterinarian who goes
by the name of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f2f731d96f604e0a850c7f219ab566dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/]Know her?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s a colleague of mine,
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]along with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f2f731d96f604e0a850c7f219ab566dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/]But when we tried to land on this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we lost control of our ship and crashed.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fb963bf5638d4c8d81f14fc64a7813b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm sorry to hear that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How did you manage
after the crash?
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8220cc4afeef44df8b37b6247b641aff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/]We just tried to stay alive.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We came
across this glowing kinda syrup.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I would
harvest it at dawn and make a juice of it.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_Root:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="20614dabf72b40d7bed5d223fc65596c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Really?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You must be talking about
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"].
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_Choi: [Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="de2d6431d49141fa891b9e7d2bb7834c" Scale="1"/]You can drink it?
[Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4b1c6f7f5667486da15756ecbff9d408" Scale="1"/]How'd it taste?
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_Reac: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5b8fbe65be0f48a6b5cf154f38852a31" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Question" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_Afte: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="eff55a34f4a24ac68da15006c5e69c23" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Of course you can drink it!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f3c270aa7baa4b50b7ab9d835ebd94eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]We've been making a medicine out of it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but it's no surprise that it's potable on
its own.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_Reac: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ab0cbdd4400143e7841af2755506f361" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Question" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_Afte: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="72584aa55235495192b9e718b39624d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Not too bad, actually!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="19f6790c0e8e468fac10fc437564eae1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Koppaites are famously fussy eaters.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
And I believe their taste buds are quite
different from our own.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroCharlie_Last:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="450954ab71fa44b88c0dec645d69449f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="0"/]You may recall when [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] mistook it for a
common beverage and drank some?[etc:Wait frame="15"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Surprise" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="8c7e597fd0a24f38b1e53dc62d8e4276" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/]That was a rough night...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_NarrowView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6dbb26ce80e04a93ba2d348c7cecfe3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="8"/]If you were with your colleagues and had
plenty of food, then...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]why were you all
alone when we found you?

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="1680bfe311c241eb822062d13e8aaffe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Ah, well.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] One day, someone just popped out
of nowhere and stole our juice![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The three
of us ran after 'em.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1680bfe311c241eb822062d13e8aaffe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/]But at some point I lost sight of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and next thing I know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s being
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]dragged away by a giant doglike creature[System:Color name="Default"].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6f487eb0e8094dbd820cf1da1476efec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So you were separated.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's horrible!

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e0812ed4a95f43c5bf69a1d8934811d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Yeah.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I kept walking around looking for
them.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But then I got so hungry I passed
out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] When I woke up,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was here with you.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4255c52f38bf4ddeb68cdee764dcfe08" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="1"/]We think we saw one of your companions
being abducted...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="05834738a92e4b6e8d1ca90f838125cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Can you remember the last place you saw
the other one?

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="700f6e2ed6214b2093f4f8921b0c0dee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Not exactly.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But they couldn't be too far
from where you found me.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][UE:Meta key="6c6a7173995e48a9b263db76c7af3038" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Understood.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]You can rest assured that
their rescue is our top priority.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="00c0f2ef6b08437d9ec51cb529039b22" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's narrow our search to
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Giant's Hearth[System:Color name="Default"]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1d7fa66e88b64256ae3b8f58ee00b507" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RemindAlph_Setup: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="06476b69a156479882046fbc833c95c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="1" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RemindAlph_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="68c6c157b6e94deb9797309eb05e96e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Good morning,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] officers!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RemindAlph_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bf5ce43dd9994db18123d4d813ca4df8" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Same as yesterday,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our priority mission
is the rescue of any and all Koppaite
castaways on this planet.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RemindAlph_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="223ad709ca86482dac2bd1df084c8787" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]One of those Koppaites was absorbed into
an Onion yet didn't become a leafling...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="223ad709ca86482dac2bd1df084c8787" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Veeery intriguing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have quite a few
questions for them specifically,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RemindAlph_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="57ba5e345d524a6f9fff810589b40c36" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Whether or not that Koppaite is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we need to rescue them right away.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RemindAlph_P04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="af68fd4316e54f248650d05f2f5c991b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit25_A_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e68648240c514a8ca6ef7be2d5f886e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let's take a look at their ID badge!
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit25_A_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a622140c38af4835a1a5a893975ea9f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Yep![etc:Wait frame="8"/] They're a Koppaite![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I just hope they're
also one of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s companions.
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit25_B_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="74561eb822874ce6a3c957c89079606c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let's take a look at their ID badge!
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit25_B_01_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="855c43fb9721429e8d54ef344ae574fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You alright,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] buddy?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Speak to me!
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit25_B_01_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="270df82c5a5045b58e2b1f90e9b243a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]He appears to be unconscious.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="270df82c5a5045b58e2b1f90e9b243a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Let him rest for now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll have plenty
of time for questions once he wakes up.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_Setup: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_NarrowView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e9eb1ddf630d45799efa3c008973c7a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="19" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f6e6313e142449d0b3bc9bb3657a091d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The Rescue Corps![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thank goodness you
found me![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f6e6313e142449d0b3bc9bb3657a091d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm from Koppai and came to this
planet with two of my colleagues.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d3bb7aababcb4c0c88ae9a09348814d4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="15"/]Is one of your colleagues a veterinarian
who goes by the name [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We've been
searching everywhere for her.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="d211aebd69d04a9c9f53d21381a643f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]You have?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And I'm guessing you haven't
found her yet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d211aebd69d04a9c9f53d21381a643f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Charlie"/]Don Bergman[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], and I are colleagues...
and friends.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We all share a common goal,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
which is why we came here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d211aebd69d04a9c9f53d21381a643f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]But then our spaceship crashed.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8a7c2f02b77e4ac986e99e0f70c2438b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm so sorry.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How have you been managing
since then?
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="86b643a8c3f14607820f3257b0b9b813" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]For a while, we were making juice out of
this glowing nectar we harvested at night.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It staved off starvation.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_Root:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9b4f3d9788f440348eb97f2c4203349b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Really?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You must be talking about
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"].
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_Choice0: [Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][UE:Meta key="59c0f19c9a50485fb6aea06b7b1c3edc" Scale="1"/]You can drink it?
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_Reactio: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="de2dec680e8c47248ed9e892101b8c0e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Question" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_After0_: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="828e98d817554f30b3d3e03e6d129c4d" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Uh-oh.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Were we not supposed to?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d4882af9588041d2af2420a693753a3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]We've been making a medicine out of it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but it's no surprise that it's potable on
its own.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_Reactio: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="073cbf96e6e44960bb95340a98c20985" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Question" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_After1_: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="96cce285cd2f4f96bd31193c03317e50" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Really, really yummy!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="2c59d176efb64d8d84a8d976512971ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Koppaites are famously fussy eaters.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
And I believe their taste buds are quite
different from our own.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_Last_P0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c87cd76f3f1842a7834b79bc9a2f3d20" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="0"/]You may recall when [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] mistook it for a
common beverage and drank some?[etc:Wait frame="15"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Surprise" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="e8c8984640c9499380b44082fb4053c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/]That was a rough night...
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_Last1_S: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_NarrowView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1e83eb7e9e944eec9b8d9d49a8906912" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:LookAt To="19" Type="2" From="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_Last1_P:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="c959f985110448cdbfe62e8296146aed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Huh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We all liked it so much we were
practically fighting over it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c959f985110448cdbfe62e8296146aed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="1"/]So you can imagine our reaction when that
thief showed up and stole our stash![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We
went after him right away![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c959f985110448cdbfe62e8296146aed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Question" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/]Course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] speed isn't really my thing,
so I got separated from the others
pretty quickly.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="075b9dc298934317a84766b2160529fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_27_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] If that's true,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's a good chance
that the other two aren't too far from
where you split up.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="075b9dc298934317a84766b2160529fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Unless you have a better idea as to where
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] might be...

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="0bc856a172bf4fb9a22f287e4edacc62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:LookAt To="12" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Sorry...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've told you all I know.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0bc856a172bf4fb9a22f287e4edacc62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/]But [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] might have some more info!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_IntroAlph_Last2_P:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][UE:Meta key="f71a846a36524113a5adf3b8e0e14660" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_27_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Understood.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]You can rest assured that
their rescue is our top priority.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e3f007ebe1b04700bb10f932cdc8eedd" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's narrow our search to
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Giant's Hearth[System:Color name="Default"]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="dabc9c569add4675bd3f6782aad2bd20" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_CollectEnergy_ToG: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="07b0bc249bee4bf6ad7c3042e3f9cc37" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="91303845392245868635ee394925ca3c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Good morning,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] officers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="91303845392245868635ee394925ca3c" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] any updates?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="8f97a919809c434aaf89975c06cc0c92" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] have both identified
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s possible location.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8f97a919809c434aaf89975c06cc0c92" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]But in order to pick up her SOS signal,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we'll have to update our radar.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="84baa428383e41c1a23f0098d8a22d08" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Sounds like we're going to[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] need more
sparklium[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="84baa428383e41c1a23f0098d8a22d08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's get to work!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="952107035b0a415a82f9ec441def6cab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_Set: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_FocusPoint345_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="dc59ed26aa6c4ab8932b5757784f0c08" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="14"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="16e473d7eb36447685737acdbce4aab3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/]Thank you again for saving us!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3b45e4d63b83402aab2234d67859f86c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/]I don't think we'd be alive, if not for you.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="32c83e1ee39a497a88b34ac414b59fc7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="14"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that reminds me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We saw you get
sucked up into that Onion, but you seem
completely...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]normal.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="410053d3843c4ea191e2e95b80a4a94e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="19" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="14"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/]Are there any sort of abnormalities that
we're missing?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Any leaves growing on you
at all?
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_P04: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="f8b30fba8e614fc5ac0dfa5de90358c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/]Um...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Not that I've noticed.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_Roo:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="446edf47e5684a4c82c8c5eb807d4348" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="14"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_27_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/]So strange.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't help but wonder why
you didn't turn into a leafling.
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_Cho: [Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="328fa992db9c4e3cb86142efd470cadc" Scale="1"/]His space suit?
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_Rea: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6df1d656180c40a8a2852aed25a5eff5" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Question" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_Aft: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0225e1a756c74b3fb08ec25f8fd3ba53" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="19" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSurprise"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Oh yeah!

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="bde0044396204f09a0624fccc3f0ae28" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I bet it's because of all that glowing juice
we drank!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="fcc9261365644f0a977ae89c7323ea64" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_27_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/]Of course![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You were ingesting nearly pure
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so the leaves must have been
broken down before they could sprout![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fcc9261365644f0a977ae89c7323ea64" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/]It's just a theory...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but an interesting one at
that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't suppose you'd let me conduct
an examination later,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh...
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_Rea: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="89f76dbce4ca403eb1f123479e7ed0a1" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Question" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_Aft:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="ad9a8e0d3aa6421d83dba6fa2bd02042" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Nah.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's just your run-of-the-mill
space suit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I bought it at Kamito
Space Suit Emporium.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][UE:Meta key="8c0a8dbf36054d63baf72201df3e2e80" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Now that I think about it...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I believe you
remained unchanged because you had
been drinking all that glow sap!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_UnlockArea006_Las:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="75833002377b4717a73b04100fa7c6ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="18" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]If [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s theory is correct,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] may
not have been turned to a leafling either.

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_FocusPoint345_IPTime0"/][UE:Meta key="4b236bb6dd9b4a7692f0cf7962f0ebb2" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You'll still rescue her though,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a401524fdbd34903ad0ef91884804b13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/]Yes![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Please![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We need your help!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="Takafuda_OverView_IPTime0"/][UE:Meta key="ae91c7336da542ceb152bf888373ac8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Calm down, now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Of course we intend to
rescue her.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's what we do.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5def894cda8d4435beb255cf62153b89" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s waiting for us deep in the forest.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's hurry up and find her.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We can't let
her and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] down!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="944163bc7e7747d4b3cf69f27bbc4be0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area006_PodTalk_Louie_00_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fa6032cef45d417a8e41270bee184a35" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] There's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Story.Story_Area006_PodTalk_Louie_00_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a1601c2c92804dea84328035ac108ec6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is with him!
Story.Story_Area006_PodTalk_Louie_00_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a92d0cec837046009a79b0486d0205b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Agh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's him![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's the scoundrel who
stole our juice!
Story.Story_Area006_PodTalk_Louie_00_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="aaa33a146f4d4ba9a3dd6ecb0104ad5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]And that castaway in [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s mouth...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Story.Story_Area006_PodTalk_Louie_00_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="419e70858729489a93149dc954696536" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Stop right there, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What are you doing
with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Explain yourself!
Story.Story_Area006_PodTalk_Louie_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fcfba2c335234bf19c786ab4e03410ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh no![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Code red![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Code red![etc:Wait frame="15"/] He's absconded
with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Story.Story_Area006_PodTalk_Louie_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0848a7889fe04f97a67492dbae2032b8" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Hrm.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What is he thinking?
Story.Story_Area006_PodTalk_Louie_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fd55aef994e84870b77d113de9636a96" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]You need to follow [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] should be
able to track the scent.
Story.Story_Area006_PodTalk_Louie_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="819b0974d87e4ec586d272bea220d479" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Agreed.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You two—follow [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s scent
and rescue [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RemindBrittany_Se: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a4f12b47966f4d0799af4652c099f863" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_Takafuda_RemindBrittany_P0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="eccde2d0d0f84b2594cccaabd799bbe5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Good morning,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] officers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Our primary
mission remains unchanged.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You know
what to do!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="77ddcef9a2ca45fd9dc2224e548c99e2" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Rescue [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] She's still located in the
Primordial Thicket.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b448b34e865947ceafbfe5f9832c8768" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/]The sooner we rescue her,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the sooner
she'll be able to examine [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4aa16514f75e4ac8a83a5e167f23b42d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/][Sound:DemoAudio Key="FinishMusic"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit26_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="79870367a7b0410b9f74898a2331ac62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Good news![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We rescued [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit26_01_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="152b84b1705e495f93456ba21a79bcda" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thank you, thank you![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...
Story.Story_CollectNpcEdit26_01_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="eb2078c139d946e8bb4ad74fe4ba1011" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Seriously,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we can't thank you enough![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We're both so grateful.
Story.Story_Area500_SelfIntroduction_NpcEdit26:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9a7f4f2fdf0d4fbcb4aad6decac0eb8e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="WaitGlad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_28_Survivor" name="WaitGlad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_27_Survivor" name="Glad02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We're so relieved to see that
you're alright.

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="cd3bd902defa449d99a17d2ab032f08c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I admit it was touch-and-go there for a
while.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think the biggest threat I faced
was my own empty stomach!

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="33e480c2167d430284cd42c6043cd6d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="16"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_27_Survivor" name="WaitGlad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Now that we're reunited,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it feels like I can
finally breathe!

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="015efe93137e4eac8a324fd7db114f4b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="16"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_27_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We owe you Rescue Corps folks.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Big-time!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5ae63f0bc67e40d69e0b5cc854eff3cd" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="14"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="15"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="16"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Nonsense.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] We're just doing our jobs.

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="81b46f2e43144ca68aaa6b4355a8d817" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Yes.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's quite enough pleasantries
for now.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81b46f2e43144ca68aaa6b4355a8d817" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Your doctor filled me in on the current
situation.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd like to have a look at [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
right away.

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8ab52fe9110b499fa78504f027a5802b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So the tip of his tail has morphed
completely into a leaf.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And not like one
that I could easily pluck from a plant.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ab52fe9110b499fa78504f027a5802b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]The symptoms seem to be quite similar
to those displayed by the leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if I'm
not mistaken.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ab52fe9110b499fa78504f027a5802b" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="20" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="14"/][Npc:LookAt To="13" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="20" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]And you've already tried administering
your medicine?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="474876d335d74dcebe7fde251d662501" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I did.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It had nooo effect.

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f9306084424c4ad9ac5f9f1e7e709457" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I see.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What exactly does this medicine
consist of?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d1301b040bc0441ca3eb9b4e9c2c6cf2" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It's a combination of glow sap and
non-leafified cells from a non-leafified
individual.

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fa905193c4fc4b4ba1bedcb08ff9b0be" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think we've struck upon
our main issue, then.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fa905193c4fc4b4ba1bedcb08ff9b0be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]If administered as a preventative measure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
the medicine may have worked.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But to cure
a space dog, you need space-dog cells.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fa905193c4fc4b4ba1bedcb08ff9b0be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you think you could make a dose of the
medicine using [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s cells instead?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8fdf027b537242299b24b24092cfacf4" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="0"/]Excellent idea.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm on it!

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c2004c5e112347aaaf04bd08be7a77f5" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_27_Survivor" name="WaitSad" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Well, shucks.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It didn't work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My guess is
that we need cells from a[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] dog that hasn't
been leafified[System:Color name="Default"].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="79807f375fd149d3b40198bb3f8d5cca" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Where are we going to find a dog like that
on this planet?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="52b0c436e8484f4e875b0168d7908748" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_27_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="TabletLookStart"/]Excuse me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but while preparing to harvest
cells from [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I came across this...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8311d8c97dd54a088c709193ea67e474" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]A huge dog thing...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could he be
talking about...
[Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="743d8896edc9443fb31cb8095edf90dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?

[Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e684a0b117c9400e961927b350b7f8c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Question" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
[Msg:BCancel enable="False"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9b902d6b94bf4cd3bc28864fc6e479c1" Scale="1"/]That giant dog?

[Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c590f42af68a4cbebdf3020df0560851" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Question" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="500f44cfa4604665886d3c9e0483ca55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]No, not [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Didn't some giant doglike
creature run away with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3a86e4d623604d15b3d7f3a10a89af1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Exactly![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We'd be fools to discount that
giant doglike creature that ran away
with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="af65ce684e264c1d8907efcd2e99de52" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh, right![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was carried away by some sort
of giant dog,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] wasn't I?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="af65ce684e264c1d8907efcd2e99de52" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I just bounced along on its back all over
the place.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We never stopped to eat,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I
must have just passed out from hunger.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="af65ce684e264c1d8907efcd2e99de52" Scale="1"/]Honestly.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Is that any way to treat a
renowned medical professional?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9a59cdd8415d4780a42e4993bc59323a" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="16"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can you remember the dog's tail?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Did it have a leaf?

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="28e632d56bfd46c5827e72bfe1d3e5fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Not that I can recall.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Though it was hard to
see much under all that fluff.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="cf19b6b812294225908fe0bca72b655a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]If we're able to collect cells from that dog,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we may just be able to save [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="edc9158f096f4198b3060073fa45e9e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The only problem is...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]where's the giant
dog now?

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3a8075d965644b37b5e04ea4ae394d1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] now that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is here with us,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it's possible that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will try to find
and "adopt" that other dog.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3a8075d965644b37b5e04ea4ae394d1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]If we follow [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s scent,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it could lead us
right to the pooch we're looking for.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="196366dd662241f182fc211746482565" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It's worth a shot.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] We have a new mission![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="196366dd662241f182fc211746482565" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Track down [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] in the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Primordial Thicket[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Keep your eyes peeled for any signs of
that giant dog!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f3888cb6de324f3aa4cd3183c9be8183" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_For_The_FinalBattle_00_P00:
