on [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="3a6c2d3ac63744f0b9fd585dbd8677a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If she was born with her leaf tail,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there
may be no way to revert her condition.
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_06: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="73ceaf9a41e2479594abc09b82b54751" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="5"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]There must be some way to cure her...
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="205e837c023343cd96adbb1b10f8f5f4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Wait"/]It's alright, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This is how it's
meant to be.
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="33f23a7f780d4f798dd2791cabbae687" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="8" Type="2" From="4"/][Npc:LookAt To="15" Type="2" From="5"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was born and raised on this planet.
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]It would be wrong to change what she is
for reasons she can't comprehend.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="33f23a7f780d4f798dd2791cabbae687" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitNoVoice"/]This is her home.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's where she belongs.
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_10: [Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ecc5eaa54aa440c3913bd70c475783cd" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Are you sure?
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_11: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="72cebdb2c26a4cfdafbaf79b5c43d72c" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="8" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I am.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] And I know it's how [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] feels too.
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_Reaction02: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b1414c81e1084fc299604f960fc26d71" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="8" Type="2" From="12"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_Reaction: [Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a39fd01caac14aa2ba29386b5ff31c8c" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1744938ce5ac4b22afcd89dee8491837" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]We all have our own homes to get back to.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1744938ce5ac4b22afcd89dee8491837" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]And I think it's time we said goodbye
to this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1744938ce5ac4b22afcd89dee8491837" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] prepare for our voyage home!
Story.Story_Area500_LouieVaccine_13: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8100d1b8f1b644d589e505ca1ef0bc14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Roger02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Roger02"/][Npc:Motion chara="GHappy" name="ICopy" lipsync="0"/]Copy that!
Story.Story_Area500_Before_ED2_StartSpaceBus_0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="360da6a1e3964206a2330a4ff23f23e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Our flight path is clear,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and all safety
mechanisms are in good working order.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="41c82a7a233a4f2d87a822e67af3b8f5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]All officers are prepared for takeoff!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b85aff444bff437980338d6e571f381b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Primary engine ready!
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a9702401a7d6424ebb5bace46f1e7978" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger"/]ALRIGHT![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ready for LAUNCH!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="108bf9c2f2ee42d6a68f0c5ab4587cea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I can't help but think of those castaways
we never had a chance to save...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0e242153e6b642ebb04505a5dda0c22c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I regret that we're leaving this planet
with leaflings left uncured...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a0c8e6264e134196b453c6c3efd605f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]What a success![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We rescued all the
castaways and cured every last leafling![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We can go home without any regrets.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c44f363c16c54096a08688bab958868b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]We must return home now to realign our
mission with HQ.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was not an easy
decision to make,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it's time to go.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a18216eda127461cbe9b6db6dbf841e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Once we've had a chance to debrief with
HQ,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we'll make our return.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Think of this as
a temporary parting.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="14aeb65784c64d4eabc0d980e880587d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You should all be proud of yourselves and
the excellent work you've done here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Next stop—home!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2be82737fa084ab3a0e8b4e4e3453fb9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]S.S. Shepherd,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] launch!
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f19d6cb0f0d24a4599e710c3fe339a2a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/]Copy THAT!
Story.Story_Area500_ED2_FirstHalf_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="943448b109fc4f45b97fe7714fd5eaa7" Scale="1"/]I hope we meet again, dear Pikmin!
Story.Story_Area500_ED2_SecondHalf_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9c51583b54104facb2b0b858cc08cb06" Scale="1"/]And so at long last...
Story.Story_Area500_ED2_SecondHalf_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8f888a363014452fbc8f793c2fbdc690" Scale="1"/]thanks to the brave efforts
of the Rescue Corps...
Story.Story_Area500_ED2_SecondHalf_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="678a7554fd3d49bbb0e4d64c3cfff179" Scale="1"/]I finally made my way home.
Story.Story_Area500_ED2_SecondHalf_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ac0865a8138c42bfb01279d8e66fcfdb" Scale="1"/]Until my next adventure...
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_Setup: [Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f202d0e7a2ca4e9294d5b2430e869d19" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="13"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_01_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Carrot:LocalizeLanguage key="EUen"/]
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:LookAtInterpolation enable="0"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4c95aa349524454b9bad766bc33cc335" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]What's going on here?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did everyone
forget how to prepare for launch?
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="48f73111379944b8980bc55298069947" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]If I may be so bold, Captain...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How could we
even consider making our return while we
know there are still castaways out there?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="48f73111379944b8980bc55298069947" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="10" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]With the gear and items created in my
mind and forged by my very own hands
combined with the strength of our team...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="48f73111379944b8980bc55298069947" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]My point is rescuing all the castaways on
this planet is still an achievable goal.
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4d76cac129ad4702a165fde056177ed3" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the future of those we have yet to
cure is weighing heavy on our minds.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4d76cac129ad4702a165fde056177ed3" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]If we are the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] shouldn't we
be doing all we can to rescue every
last leafling?
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ee9b050e9dd64c94bec3deedab1495fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I know we helped all the castaways,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but, uh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]we all feel like there are
still so many areas left to explore,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ee9b050e9dd64c94bec3deedab1495fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]The newbie never even completed the
mission I gave 'em.
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ab8e277936ce43ddb38fd4cce68e1b7d" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="SadTalk"/]No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's my fault, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was able to
clear up our communication issues and
made contact with Rescue Corps HQ.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ab8e277936ce43ddb38fd4cce68e1b7d" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]They'd like us to stand by for a little
longer until they're prepared to receive
all the survivors we found here.
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="41efe4ad898f49788d07fc857efdf1b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="15" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="15" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="15" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="15" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Plus, we have yet to hear the
remainder of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Shipwreck Tale[System:Color name="Default"].
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e864d493a0e4a51a27fa6986cf2e55c" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="6"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLouie" name="WaitLouie02" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="WaitNoVoice" lipsync="0"/]I believe I speak for all the castaways
you've rescued when I say we'll do
whatever the Rescue Corps requires.
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_P07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Msg:DemoCameraName name="None"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="52c576050bda44ff89eb9d4db9631979" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="0" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="10"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="7"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="8"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="11"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="3"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Well then.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Then let's put off our departure
for a bit longer.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do what needs
to be done.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52c576050bda44ff89eb9d4db9631979" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:LookAt To="14" Type="2" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="14" Type="2" From="9"/][Npc:LookAt To="14" Type="2" From="12"/][Npc:LookAt To="14" Type="2" From="3"/]In the meantime, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] make all the
necessary preparations so we can return
home as soon as we're ready.
Story.Story_Area500_StartAfter2ndEnding_P08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="cbeda60dff874b719054a327754d396e" Scale="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/]Copy that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll be standing by and ready
for takeoff at a MOMENT'S notice!
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv3_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d26163e2669742178802e87d1a31b5cd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]This will expand our range and help us
pick up distant SOS signals.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's give
it a spin.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv3_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5a295bd2a6ca4c559401bdeb4dde0e0f" Scale="1"/]Almost done...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5a295bd2a6ca4c559401bdeb4dde0e0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Huzzah![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We've detected multiple
SOS signals![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5a295bd2a6ca4c559401bdeb4dde0e0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]I hope this gets us closer to finding our
missing officers and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv3_02_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a76587d8db5e4662af4b9ad6ae2093dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Make a record of that area right
away, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv4_01_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="dc702f94d7a54180827fbc7ceaa74636" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Energy replenishment complete![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dc702f94d7a54180827fbc7ceaa74636" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Now let's switch on the radar...
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv4_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b2b245aa6e9a44a7a851321e622c734f" Scale="1"/]It's working...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2b245aa6e9a44a7a851321e622c734f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Yes![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Once again, we've detected more
SOS signals in an unexplored area.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv4_02_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1f76cedb24aa4ecbb88654cf1ddc4dfc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]I'm glad to hear our search radius
has increased.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1f76cedb24aa4ecbb88654cf1ddc4dfc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Let's not waste any more time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We need
to get out there and find our missing
Rescue Officers and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv5_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="36bf593968f8408eb43e2b6e0dcd9bd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We've got enough energy stored up that
we should have no problem starting the
S.S. Shepherd's engines.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="36bf593968f8408eb43e2b6e0dcd9bd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]I'll make sure the ignition is functioning
properly.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv5_02_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e6f8c1693a1467584c64dee212e0dd3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Now we can take off at any time!
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv5_02_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0218874ea46f42cc83c58da43e2cefa0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]After we find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], of course.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv5_03_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="bbde8d99fb2047e5add1e44dcdd8cb04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Now we can take off at any time!
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv5_03_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="499aab46707f4a7d99fcf0c2d23cba3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If we could only find our pilot...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Until then,
the S.S. Shepherd remains grounded.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv6_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2509534c899b487fa8e40d69aaf75add" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've done it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Our radar systems
are officially updated.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Give them a test
run, and search for some castaways!
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv6_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e1c068bea0714be2ba8adba43b9eac85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Wait"/]Something's happening...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e1c068bea0714be2ba8adba43b9eac85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Amazing![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We just picked up multiple
SOS signals from an unexplored area![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e1c068bea0714be2ba8adba43b9eac85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I thought we'd reached maximum capacity,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but I should've known [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] would figure
something out.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv6_02_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ad9685d532504d039a98f93bb482fbb1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Some of these signals have to belong to
Nelle and the other Koppaites![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ad9685d532504d039a98f93bb482fbb1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Let's get this rescue off the ground![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Oatchi's counting on us.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv7_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d1fbdf56b4534b80bed6f3162ba0e1d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So, I'm going to remove the limiter and
start up the radar again.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's see what
that does!
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv7_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="72939bfb0d3c4cd6bd15e9156163b1b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Let's see...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="72939bfb0d3c4cd6bd15e9156163b1b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]That did it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't believe there are
so many SOS signals coming from
that unexplored area.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv7_02_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="68a676a5652c4c7b9774cacaddc6edd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The scientific prowess on Koppai seems
to be remarkably close to my own.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I won't
underestimate them from now on.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv7_02_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c374fd6068ba442e9ed7efe53d324c3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Talk"/]One of those signals could be coming from
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Saving her is our first priority.
Story.Story_Area500_RestoreSpaceBus_Lv7_Repair:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="e17874e2dc2844e6a62c240f155983a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]First we do a little of this...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then a little
of that...
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="341de789f315450daba5fc3c5a301004" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]All done![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We're good to go.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="96a85c9d02324a86b043d9f5107d5db8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="NoMotionSurprise"/]That was amazing to witness![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's inject
the sparklium and see what happens!
Story.Story_Area500_Before_Restore_Lv7_Alph_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="fe9d3527547741799c6c8b1a72d18447" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thank goodness you're alright!

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="3832ff7bc72d489babbd80eb282963ac" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're safe!

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="2eb03174809a41d1b2d60c257b546cb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I am.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] on the other hand...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know
you're still getting your bearings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but do
you have any idea where she might be?

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="e0953919e75546e3b5f6dc72f15be0ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Sorry,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but no.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I lost sight of her early on.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Guess I'm a pretty slow runner.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="edfc88a09fdb40dc8c4dfe7df4c8f252" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Then you really were the last person to
see her, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a353abb042bb485e932e9766dfbae75c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Can you remember anything else?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Which
direction she and the dog ran?

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="7a5d57f9fd984bc7ad13ae930f5e0a49" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Oof...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let me try to put myself back in that
spot...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7a5d57f9fd984bc7ad13ae930f5e0a49" Scale="1"/]Hmm...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7a5d57f9fd984bc7ad13ae930f5e0a49" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]I remember something![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7a5d57f9fd984bc7ad13ae930f5e0a49" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]The giant dog carried her [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]deeper into the
forest[System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Way past where I'd fallen down.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="333a5e686f6f41089a2750933ceac95f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Kee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]hee...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't believe our radar can
effectively reach that area.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="62ffd7b3500946fb97f917e102695fef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]The S.S. Shepherd's radar signal has
already been boosted close to its limit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="62ffd7b3500946fb97f917e102695fef" Scale="1"/]I'm not sure we'll be able to extend its
reach any further...

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="fd6ac26b8fc441ed84eb11c53a41275f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Would you mind if I took a look at it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm pretty good with machines!
Story.Story_Area500_Before_Restore_Lv7_Charlie: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="92f85f27953647faaf7328314eac18c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thank goodness you're alright!

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="f147bdf3f5f2452abac5597156dbf841" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I could say the same about you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Now we just have to find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9b228c5f29e34ce3bed924bb53085bb0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The search for her is currently underway,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but we could use your help,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We're in dire need of a lead.

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="b735a3a46535439a9feb1c2bde9fee27" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Actually,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think I might have one![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I remember seeing [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] being carried
off by a giant doglike creature!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0591b85b89ed4d98ae5af52f1587d2b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]A giant dog?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do you know where it
took her?

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="19fb9d510e604b5982fa7c1874d614cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Not exactly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it was headed [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]deeper into
the forest[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Beyond where you found me.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="4cec12fa4aac45518d4816eff804581e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Kee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]hee...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't believe our radar can
effectively reach that area.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9abb64b21cc2404c82419f34cc92d576" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]The S.S. Shepherd's radar signal has
already been boosted close to its limit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9abb64b21cc2404c82419f34cc92d576" Scale="1"/]I'm not sure we'll be able to extend its
reach any further...

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="b3725dbd66f54d578862295e0ce518da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Would you mind if I took a look at it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm pretty good with machines!
Story.Story_Area500_Before_Restore_Lv7_Double_: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="c6c446c4809b45edbfca9d04e92f66ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thank goodness you're alright!

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="4e70512449a74770b1cbaecf43046f60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I could say the same about you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f78813a2376a45f4b9ac984f78d88cf5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do either of you two know a veterinarian
on this planet named [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We've been
trying to locate her for a while now.

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="163a35995a504852a66f03ec72ff6416" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]You have?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And I'm guessing you haven't
found her yet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="163a35995a504852a66f03ec72ff6416" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Charlie"/]Don Bergman[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], and I are colleagues...
and friends.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We all share a common goal,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
which is why we came here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="163a35995a504852a66f03ec72ff6416" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]But then our spaceship crashed.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="45ac7e95196043ad870b13a944fecd95" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm sorry to hear that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How did you manage
after the crash?

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="f3f376908cc6419896c545c76aa42cc5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/]We just tried to stay alive.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We came
across this glowing kinda syrup.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I would
harvest it at dawn and make a juice of it.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c183e2c8e9984326bebb52bc2198567e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Really?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You must be talking about
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"].

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="63ee36f1be08472485f7e46eb0e51b6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Ah, well.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] One day, someone just popped out
of nowhere and stole our juice![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The three
of us ran after 'em.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="63ee36f1be08472485f7e46eb0e51b6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/]But at some point I lost sight of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and next thing I know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s being
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]dragged away by a giant doglike creature[System:Color name="Default"].

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e21d18f18e3441108ac27a2cc87bf89a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]A giant dog?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do you know where it
took her?

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="1eb2697cfa77472e9678711c0a85fa58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Not exactly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it was headed [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]deeper into
the forest[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Beyond where you found me.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="768caf858d3041c086be6419c71a1a77" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Kee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]hee...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't believe our radar can
effectively reach that area.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2e4a9fccf8dd4bc4867b7f87d008a3d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]The S.S. Shepherd's radar signal has
already been boosted close to its limit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2e4a9fccf8dd4bc4867b7f87d008a3d9" Scale="1"/]I'm not sure we'll be able to extend its
reach any further...

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="4fdbf4fa47c043e6bfc1b4f0fe78a21d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Would you mind if I took a look at it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm pretty good with machines!
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_01_Default_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bf39304947e64ef1b85a1ad180b7d0b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The Rescue Command Post was getting a
bit crowded,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so we started clearing a new
area, when we came upon something odd...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bf39304947e64ef1b85a1ad180b7d0b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly"/]A spaceship in disrepair!
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_01_Default_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f18530742c38480b9a9f6a53a1ba54a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Huh.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's clearly missing its captain.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f18530742c38480b9a9f6a53a1ba54a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]They're probably out there somewhere,
in need of rescue.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll do our best to
find them.
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_01_Default_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fab120348f744ec1baf86f0e96ba2d5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I almost forgot![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We also found some raw
materials while establishing the new area.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Please put them to good use!
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_01_AfterTakafuda:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="cbbacded411a43538cfd588dc9bbbef2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I forgot to tell you![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cbbacded411a43538cfd588dc9bbbef2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The Rescue Command Post was getting a
bit crowded,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so we started clearing a new
area, when we came upon something odd...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cbbacded411a43538cfd588dc9bbbef2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]A spaceship in disrepair!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0838d6922ca14bf0af6fd5ec3d7ea218" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Huh.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's clearly missing its captain.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0838d6922ca14bf0af6fd5ec3d7ea218" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]They're probably out there somewhere,
in need of rescue.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll do our best to
find them.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6d0330d526734a339375a83ee5c8f4b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I almost forgot![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We also found some raw
materials while establishing the new area.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Please put them to good use!
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_02_Default_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2ea5383bb9824e428f72c817a0ccc574" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Once again, the Rescue Command Post
was starting to feel a bit cramped,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so
we've expanded into a new area!
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_02_Default_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ea70a02eefde4f028407b862f776d5ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and all the castaways joined forces
and worked hard to make this happen.
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_02_Default_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="dbeb67b6c9d24b04bb01ac1515e651ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Here's some raw material that we dug up
while clearing the new space.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm sure you'll
find a use for it.
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_02_AfterTakafuda:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9efed1d0dbd44af2ab85af30b384af7c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I've got one last thing to report.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9efed1d0dbd44af2ab85af30b384af7c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Once again, the Rescue Command Post
was starting to feel a bit cramped,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so
we've expanded into a new area!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="d6b929a21cb444e5ac0589528bd14fbf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Collin and all the castaways joined forces
and worked hard to make this happen.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="34a1133e556d450b89d03400d72e9b8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Here's some raw material that we dug up
while clearing the new space.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm sure you'll
find a use for it.
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_02_AfterCultivat:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b10f44d599d7485e8fed35b561c39a63" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]And since our population has grown so
quickly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we went ahead and cleared a
second area as well!
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_03_Default_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d971be7e6e304a8b8481acb57f30b4a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]After many castaway requests,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we're
adding even more space to the Rescue
Command Post.
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_03_Default_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="01c66fc95be74b57841a0af22ccedbe6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Hopefully, this will ensure all the
castaways stay comfortable while
they're here.
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_03_Default_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="809959987c894f4887c9a60d319cb6e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We have enough space now that I'm sure
we can fit anyone else we rescue while
we're on this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="809959987c894f4887c9a60d319cb6e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Everyone you've rescued pulled together
to give this to you as a way of saying
thank you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I believe it's more raw material.
Story.Story_Area500_Cultivate_03_AfterTakafuda:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="23ff5a17dda74d05a7d4338678dddaae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I have one more thing to report.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23ff5a17dda74d05a7d4338678dddaae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]After many castaway requests,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we're
adding even more space to the Rescue
Command Post.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="03e2282e4c1e47d6a6d6730ca6b6d69f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Hopefully, this will ensure all the
castaways stay comfortable while
they're here.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7bb756c4d45e430885e46ce714948f51" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We have enough space now that I'm sure
we can fit anyone else we rescue while
we're on this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7bb756c4d45e430885e46ce714948f51" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Everyone you've rescued pulled together
to give this to you as a way of saying
